name: RunesBot
description: RunesBot is a revolutionary platform designed to simplify and enhance your interaction with the Runes ecosystem on the Bitcoin blockchain. This one-stop tool facilitates a range of activities including the minting, creation, and bridging of Runes across different blockchains. Whether you're looking to buy, sell, or explore Runes, RunesBot provides a seamless, user-friendly interface for all your blockchain interactions.
